mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing image loading and reducing pop-ups for better mobile performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Improve page speed by optimizing images and leveraging browser caching.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance on-page SEO with better keyword usage, meta tags, and alt text for images.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and reduce clutter for a more streamlined experience.
bookingFlowTip: Ensure a smoother transition between pages and minimize the number of steps to book.
tips: Increase site speed by reducing large image sizes.
Ensure accessibility features are visible and usable on all devices.
Improve internal linking for better navigation.
